Class MetricUnits

java.lang.Object
Tools.Units.MetricUnits
public class MetricUnits extends Object
This is a class meant to deal with and standardize Strings representing metric system units
Version:
1.0.0

  • Method Details

    • createMetricUnit

      public static String createMetricUnit(String prefix, String type)
      Creates a valid metric unit based on the provided prefix and measurement type
      Parameters:
      prefix - The prefix of the desired metric unit
      type - The type of measurement of the desired metric unit
      Returns:
      If the provided prefix and type can be combined into a valid unit, then returns a valid metric unit String of the correct prefix and type, otherwise returns a String with the value "Not a unit"

    • isAValidMetricUnit

      public static boolean isAValidMetricUnit(String unit)
      Checks whether a given String is a valid metric unit recognized by the MetricUnits class
      Parameters:
      unit - The String to be checked
      Returns:
      Returns true if the given String is a valid combination of a metric prefix and measurement type
